channel.title: Untitle on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Untitle on Blog

item.title: Past
item.description: export SUBJECTS_DIR=/usr/local/freesurfer/7.4.0/data_sub rm -rf *_fsaverage6 rm -rf /home/godot/cpp_geodesics_main/subjects mkdir /home/godot/cpp_geodesics_main/subjects # downsample for subjectname in $(ls -d * | grep nii) do mkdir ${subjectname}_fsaverage6 mkdir ${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf mri_surf2surf --hemi rh --srcsubject ${subjectname} --sval-xyz pial --trgsubject fsaverage6 --trgicoorder 6 --tval-xyz ${subjectname}/mri/brain.mgz --tval ${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/rh.pial mri_surf2surf --hemi lh --srcsubject ${subjectname} --sval-xyz pial --trgsubject fsaverage6 --trgicoorder 6 --tval-xyz ${subjectname}/mri/brain.mgz --tval ${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/lh.pial # mv ./${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/lh.pial.mgh ./${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/lh.pial # mv ./${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/rh.pial.mgh ./${subjectname}_fsaverage6/surf/rh.pial done #compute geodcircle mv *_fsaverage6 /home/godot/cpp_geodesics_main/subjects export SUBJECTS_DIR=/home/godot/cpp_geodesics_main/subjects cd /home/godot/cpp_geodesics_main/subjects ls -d *_fsaverage6 | sed 's/^/subjects\//' > subject.
